metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10380 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: kwallet-pam in KDE KWallet before 5.12.6 allows local users to obtain ownership of arbitrary files via a symlink attack.

notes.Note: sbeattie> first attempt at fixing this caused a regression in at least artful and xenial, thus reverted.

criterions.comment: kwallet-pam: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
